document.masterDocTitle: Revision of the genus Platyscelis Latreille, 1818 from China (Coleoptera: Tenebrionidae: Platyscelidini)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of the genus Platyscelis Latreille, 1818 from China (Coleoptera: Tenebrionidae: Platyscelidini)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks.
P. subcordata
was recorded from Taiwan by Miwa (1931) , Kaszab (1940) could not find the specimen(s) although he recognised the authenticity of its distribution.
P. strigicollis
was described from Japan by Lewis (1895) . However, there were no distribution records of Taiwan and Japan by Egorov (2008) , probably considered of transporting goods (e.g., woods) by human. In the recent study, precious specimens of
P. ovata Ballion, 1878
have been collected from Qinghai, Gansu, Inner Mongolia and Guangxi, (see material of
P. ovata
), and
Oodescelis ( Acutoodescelis )
sp. from Taiwan (not published yet), and also
Oodescelis
sp. from Hubei (not published yet). Therefore, the distribution records of Taiwan and Japan should be restored.
